data.what_is: SalesCaptain is an AI-powered customer experience marketing (CXM) platform that helps local businesses win. We help local businesses the way they build their business and modernize the way they communicate with their customers - from facilitating online reviews, launching personalized marketing campaigns, web chat, payments, and much more.
data.product_description: SalesCaptain is an AI-powered customer experience marketing (CXM) platform that helps local businesses win. We help local businesses the way they build their business and modernize the way they communicate with their customers - from facilitating online reviews, launching personalized marketing campaigns, web chat, payments, and much more. We are backed by top investors (Better Capital, iSeed Fund, Pointone Capital) & marque angel investors.

initial_reviews.review_title: Amazing business communication software everyone should try
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SalesCaptain?
New AI features with AI calling and reception for near zero human live conversation by AI. Very modern calling stack to support all business needs when it comes to PBX. Integrates well through Zapier with other platforms. Amazing customer support!

What do you dislike about SalesCaptain?
Not much we are quite satisfied with the software

What problems is SalesCaptain solving and how is that benefiting you?
Salescaptain helps to make customer communication better across calls, texts, webchat, and social channels. We use it to text our customers on-time, use their telephony system and also the AI webchat to resolve up to 90% of queries instantly.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about SalesCaptain?
review_question_answers.answer: New AI features with AI calling and reception for near zero human live conversation by AI. Very modern calling stack to support all business needs when it comes to PBX. Integrates well through Zapier with other platforms. Amazing customer support!

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about SalesCaptain?
review_question_answers.answer: Not much we are quite satisfied with the software

review_question_answers.question: What problems is SalesCaptain solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Salescaptain helps to make customer communication better across calls, texts, webchat, and social channels. We use it to text our customers on-time, use their telephony system and also the AI webchat to resolve up to 90% of queries instantly.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SalesCaptain?
The platform's wide range of features and ease of use is definitely very likeable . It also integrated with other CRM easily

What do you dislike about SalesCaptain?
Some features are just too complex for us , we are not experts since we run a small businesses

What problems is SalesCaptain solving and how is that benefiting you?
It helps us interact with website visitors in real-time, capture leads, and guide potential customers through the sales funnel via personalized conversations. This has definitely enhanced user experience,  customer satisfaction, and ultimately contribute to improved sales and marketing outcomes for us

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about SalesCaptain?
review_question_answers.answer: The platform's wide range of features and ease of use is definitely very likeable . It also integrated with other CRM easily

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about SalesCaptain?
review_question_answers.answer: Some features are just too complex for us , we are not experts since we run a small businesses

review_question_answers.question: What problems is SalesCaptain solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: It helps us interact with website visitors in real-time, capture leads, and guide potential customers through the sales funnel via personalized conversations. This has definitely enhanced user experience,  customer satisfaction, and ultimately contribute to improved sales and marketing outcomes for us

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SalesCaptain?
Easy to navigate dashboard and integration. Support has been good thus far. Easy to make edits and reply to reviews. Includes a lot of tools the others do for far less. We are able to manage our Google reviews, citations/listings and chat/text our customers from one simple dashboard or mobile app.

What do you dislike about SalesCaptain?
Ability to respond to a message when it is emailed (ex text link).

What problems is SalesCaptain solving and how is that benefiting you?
Ability to manage all our Google reviews in one place (3 locations) and respond. Easy to communicate text/web chat with customers in the same dashboard. PLus we can update the majority of our business citations/listings from here as well. Very affordable for small business when compared to Podium or Birdseye, even though they are newer to the game. No long term contracts or setup fees either.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about SalesCaptain?
review_question_answers.answer: Easy to navigate dashboard and integration. Support has been good thus far. Easy to make edits and reply to reviews. Includes a lot of tools the others do for far less. We are able to manage our Google reviews, citations/listings and chat/text our customers from one simple dashboard or mobile app.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about SalesCaptain?
review_question_answers.answer: Ability to respond to a message when it is emailed (ex text link).

review_question_answers.question: What problems is SalesCaptain solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Ability to manage all our Google reviews in one place (3 locations) and respond. Easy to communicate text/web chat with customers in the same dashboard. PLus we can update the majority of our business citations/listings from here as well. Very affordable for small business when compared to Podium or Birdseye, even though they are newer to the game. No long term contracts or setup fees either.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SalesCaptain?
I like using sales captain for a lot of different things such as getting sales things done and getting info on how my sales is working to earn me some money. okay

What do you dislike about SalesCaptain?
I don;t like that it is not as good as salesforce for pretty much anything, Salesforce is the best, but needsa lot of work i'm not sure about sales captin. okay.

What problems is SalesCaptain solving and how is that benefiting you?
Well, it works well in terms of helping with marketing, becuase it helps my old team to find out what we were dioing right and wrong in terms of figuring stuff out

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about SalesCaptain?
review_question_answers.answer: I like using sales captain for a lot of different things such as getting sales things done and getting info on how my sales is working to earn me some money. okay

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about SalesCaptain?
review_question_answers.answer: I don;t like that it is not as good as salesforce for pretty much anything, Salesforce is the best, but needsa lot of work i'm not sure about sales captin. okay.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is SalesCaptain solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Well, it works well in terms of helping with marketing, becuase it helps my old team to find out what we were dioing right and wrong in terms of figuring stuff out

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SalesCaptain?
Salescaptain have more than 100+ other app integrations that is super helpful when it comes to using it for our needs mostly. And, trying to get the data from a normal way is good.

What do you dislike about SalesCaptain?
The wordings used in the website can't match user thought process and the plan and pricing seems high when compared to other tools and resources and apart from that more structured words should be added.

What problems is SalesCaptain solving and how is that benefiting you?
Integrating all the marketing tools and needs in one place is tremendous helpful for people and business as they don't have to go out for different things from different business, salescaptain made this process super cool

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about SalesCaptain?
review_question_answers.answer: Salescaptain have more than 100+ other app integrations that is super helpful when it comes to using it for our needs mostly. And, trying to get the data from a normal way is good.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about SalesCaptain?
review_question_answers.answer: The wordings used in the website can't match user thought process and the plan and pricing seems high when compared to other tools and resources and apart from that more structured words should be added.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is SalesCaptain solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Integrating all the marketing tools and needs in one place is tremendous helpful for people and business as they don't have to go out for different things from different business, salescaptain made this process super cool
